query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total,
  SUM(CASE WHEN ativo = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as ativos,
  SUM(CASE WHEN ativo = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as inativos
FROM projects
